newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Hong Kong tenders HK$500 mln 7-yr notes on Nov 25.
newsitem.headline: Hong Kong tenders HK$500 mln 7-yr notes on Nov 25.

text.p: The Hong Kong Monetary Authority said on Monday it will tender the fifth HK$500 million issue of seven-year exchange fund notes on November 25 for settlement on November 26.
The authority said it will hold another HK$100 million as reserve for supply to market makers in the secondary market.
The notes will mature on November 26, 2003, and carry an interest rate of 6.8 percent per annum payable semi-annually.
